p: Human lung A549 cells (ATCC # CCL-185, Manassas, VA, USA) were routinely cultured in Dulbecco′s modified MEM (DMEM) supplemented with 0.2% ( w/ v) glucose, non-essential amino acids, sodium pyruvate, 2 mM l-glutamine, and 10% Fetal bovine serum (FBS; Gibco, Grand Island, NY, USA). Madin-Darby canine kidney (MDCK) cells (ATCC # CCL-34) were cultured similarly, but in completed DMEM supplemented with 5% FBS. Cells were grown as monolayers in 5% CO 2 and passaged by trypsinization 2–3 times each week.
